Title: Relates to the treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence
Summary: Relates to the treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence; provides the type of evidence to be collected and maintained; provides that the office of victim services shall cover the costs of the domestic violence forensic exam; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง2805-z, Pub Health L; amd ยง631, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to the treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence
